sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Folder, FolderPlus, Search, MoreVertical, Edit3, Trash2, File, Calendar, User, ChevronRight, Grid3X3, List, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; const Folders = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('grid'); const [showCreateModal, setShowCreateModal] = useState(false); const [newFolderName, setNewFolderName] = useState(''); const [selectedFolder, setSelectedFolder] = useState(null); // Mock data const [folders] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Project Documents', documentCount: 12, size: '45.2 MB', created: '2024-08-15', lastModified: '2024-08-20', owner: 'John Doe', color: 'from-blue-400 to-blue-600', recentFiles: ['Project Proposal.pdf', 'Requirements.docx', 'Timeline.xlsx'] }, { id: 2, name: 'Marketing Materials', documentCount: 8, size: '23.7 MB', created: '2024-08-10', lastModified: '2024-08-19', owner: 'John Doe', color: 'from-purple-400 to-purple-600', recentFiles: ['Brand Guidelines.pdf', 'Social Media.jpg', 'Campaign.pptx'] }, { id: 3, name: 'Financial Reports', documentCount: 15, size: '12.3 MB', created: '2024-08-05', lastModified: '2024-08-18', owner: 'John Doe', color: 'from-green-400 to-green-600', recentFiles: ['Q3 Report.xlsx', 'Budget.pdf', 'Analysis.docx'] }, { id: 4, name: 'Design Assets', documentCount: 25, size: '156.8 MB', created: '2024-07-28', lastModified: '2024-08-17', owner: 'John Doe', color: 'from-pink-400 to-pink-600', recentFiles: ['Logo.svg', 'Icons.zip', 'Mockups.fig'] }, { id: 5, name: 'Meeting Notes', documentCount: 6, size: '4.1 MB', created: '2024-08-01', lastModified: '2024-08-16', owner: 'John Doe', color: 'from-orange-400 to-orange-600', recentFiles: ['Weekly Sync.docx', 'Client Call.pdf', 'Action Items.txt'] }, { id: 6, name: 'Archive', documentCount: 34, size: '89.5 MB', created: '2024-06-15', lastModified: '2024-08-10', owner: 'John Doe', color: 'from-gray-400 to-gray-600', recentFiles: ['Old Project.zip', 'Legacy Docs.pdf', 'Archive.rar'] } ]); const filteredFolders = folders.filter(folder => folder.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || folder.recentFiles.some(file => file.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase())) ); const handleCreateFolder = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (newFolderName.trim()) { // Here you would typically make an API call to create the folder console.log('Creating folder:', newFolderName); setNewFolderName(''); setShowCreateModal(false); } }; const FolderCard = ({ folder }) => (
{/* Header */}
{/* Content */}

{folder.name}

{folder.documentCount} files {folder.size}
{/* Recent files preview */}

Recent files:

{folder.recentFiles.slice(0, 3).map((file, index) => (
{file}
))}
{/* Footer */}
Modified {folder.lastModified}
); const FolderRow = ({ folder }) => (

{folder.name}

{folder.documentCount} files

{folder.size} {folder.owner} {folder.lastModified}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Folders

{filteredFolders.length} folders

{/* Search and View Controls */}
{/* Search */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-3 bg-white/50 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" />
{/* View Mode Toggle */}
{/* Statistics */}

Total Folders

{folders.length}

Total Files

{folders.reduce((sum, folder) => sum + folder.documentCount, 0)}

GB

Storage Used

2.4

This Month

+3

{/* Folders Grid/List */} {viewMode === 'grid' ? (
{filteredFolders.map(folder => ( ))}
) : (
{filteredFolders.map(folder => ( ))}
Folder Size Owner Modified Actions
)} {/* Empty State */} {filteredFolders.length === 0 && (

No folders found

Create your first folder to organize your documents

)} {/* Create Folder Modal */} {showCreateModal && (

Create New Folder

setNewFolderName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter folder name" className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#7A85C1] focus:border-transparent transition-all duration-200" required autoFocus />
)}
); }; export default Folders;
